data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 07, 2023
data.news_body:
1. Approved the un-audited financial results of the Company as per Indian Accounting Standards ('INDAS') for the quarter and six months period ended September 30, 2023

2. Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to announce that the Board of Directors have considered and approved the proposal to invest in M/s. Aceware Fintech Services Private Limited ('Investee Company')

The necessary disclosures in accordance with SEBI Regulations are enclosed

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Approved The Audited Financial Results For The FY 2022-23 And Recommended Final Dividend
data.news_body:
Approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company as per INDAS for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.
Recommended a Final Dividend of ?2 per Equity Share of ?1 each for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2023

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company as per INDAS for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.A copy of the Audited Financial Results for the year ended March 31, 2023 along with the Auditors' Report (with unmodified opinion) and Declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendment) Regulations, 2016 are enclosed

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Company we would like to inform that an Investor Conference was held today, (February 07, 2023) at 10:00 a.m. (IST) at Hotel Grand Hyatt, Santacruz, Mumbai. Audio Recording of the interaction is uploaded on the Company''s website and the link of the same is mentioned below for your reference: https://radiantcashservices.com/meetings-2/No unpublished price sensitive information was shared/discussed at the meet.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the 'Transcript of the Earnings Conference Call' for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2022, held on Monday, January 30, 2023, for your information and records.

data.caption: Audio Recording Of Earnings Conference Call For The Unaudited Financial Results Of The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022 Held On January 30, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the 'Audio Recording of the Earnings Conference Call' on the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, held on Monday, January 30, 2023 is uploaded on the Company''s website and the link of the same is mentioned below for your reference: https://radiantcashservices.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Earnings-Conference-Call-%E2%80%93-Audio-Recording.mp3

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed a copy of the 'Earnings Conference Call - Presentation' on the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2022, which will be circulated to the Investors/ Analysts for the Earnings Conference Call scheduled on Monday, January 30, 2023 at 11:00 a.m. (IST).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter / Period Ended December 31, 2022 And Declaration Of Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III and Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today (January 28, 2023) have transacted the following items:

i. Approved the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company as per INDAS for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2022. A copy of the same along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed.

ii. Declared Interim Dividend of ?1 per Equity Share of ?1 each.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results - For The Quarter And Period Ended December 31 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III and Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today (January 28, 2023) have transacted the following items:i. Approved the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company as per INDAS for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2022. A copy of the same along with the Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors are enclosed.ii. Declared Interim Dividend of ?1 per Equity Share of ?1 each.Meeting Start Time: 02:00 p.m. IST, End Time: 03:45 p.m. IST
